typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		quiz as (sport as (q1 as (question as string, options as string[], answer as string)), maths as (q1 as (question as string, options as string[], answer as string), q2 as (question as string, options as string[], answer as string)))
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> jsonfile
jsonfile foldDown(unroll(quiz.sport.q1.options),
	mapColumn(
		question = quiz.sport.q1.question,
		options = quiz.sport.q1.options,
		answer = quiz.sport.q1.answer,
		maths = quiz.maths
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 foldDown(unroll(maths.q1.options),
	mapColumn(
		question = maths.q1.question,
		options = maths.q1.options,
		answer = maths.q1.answer,
		q2 = maths.q2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
Flatten2 foldDown(unroll(q2.options),
	mapColumn(
		question = q2.question,
		options = q2.options,
		answer = q2.answer
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten3
Flatten3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['examJson.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> JSON
